events.text:
So frog.
Anyways terrifying or not.
You have to admit claire's a professional at her job.
well atleast she's better at her job than well most other people.
so tell me something.

events.question: have you.. ever seen a sword made of leaf?

events.text:
so you know all about it huh?
well that sword is.. uh.. made of grass
It's basically a traditions thing y'know?
What does that have to do with me?

well It's basically a traditions thing.
theres nothing [wave]too[/wave] much too worry about.

anyways.
let me tell you a story.
A story of the underworld.
There's this island right?
It's pretty close. Like by the main city, and that island has a volcano or so they say.
But in that volcano, there are gears and industrial looking machines.
pretty weird huh?
Turns out it was like that for over 300 years by now.
But nobody knows who or even why there are gears in there to begin with.
and over the years, there has been many rumors and conspiracies about it.
You are going to that volcano soon, soo.. you'll get to see it yourself.
Of course I'm not going because I don't want to.
Anyways, that was a nice lunch.
I'll meet you at the train station.
See ya, kid.
